entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -33.4°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
